name: Healthier Eggs Benny
description: A healthier version of eggs benny made with a simple cashew hollandaise sauce.

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly, 3 Onion, or CCB Dip Mix

preparation: Combine all sauce ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. If a thinner consistency is desired, add 1–2 tbsp of water and continue to blend for an additional 30 seconds.
Heat the sauce on the stove, in the microwave, or in the oven until warm.
Fill four Prep Bowls with 1⁄2 cup cold water each. Crack one egg into each bowl. Microwave one at a time, about 1 min, until yolk is gently set. Remove from water and set aside. Repeat.
To assemble, place 1⁄4 cup mixed greens on each English muffin half. Top with two eggs, drizzle each serving with 1⁄4 cup sauce, and top with avocado slices.
tips: Not a bread fan? Skip the English muffin and serve with half a steamed sweet potato.
Make it vegan: Swap out eggs for tofu slices.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Irresistible flavours of smoky bacon (plant-based), real Parmesan & chives.
